Ã‚Â³                                                                              Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ Sonic and company are back and better than ever in                           Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ Sonic Adventure 2: Battle for Nintendo GameCube. Dr. Eggman                  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ is up to his old tricks, and its up to Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles           Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ to stop him yet again. Sonic Adventure 2: Battle features faster action,     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ all-new two-player games, and a branching storyline that lets you choose     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ to save the world as the Hero side, or conquer it as the Dark side.          Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ Two new playable characters enter the Sonic universe -- a mysterious dark    Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ hedgehog called Shadow, and a jewel-thieving bat named Rouge.                Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ In the single-player mode, youll go through more than 30 unique stages,     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ which include everything from a forgotten pyramid, an abandoned military     Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ base, and a giant space station. Then theres the expanded two-player mode,  Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ which features 12 playable characters competing in new head-to-head games.   Ã‚Â³
Ã‚Â³ All of this adds up to Sonics biggest adventure yet!                        Ã‚Â³
